Description:
Developing solid relationships with key clients that bring in the most income for the company. Addressing and resolving key clients' complaints. Acting as the main point of contact between key clients and internal teams.1) Creates Long-Term Relationships. 
2) Builds and Increases Trust. 
3) Meets Growth and Retention Goals.
4) Develops Consistent and Repeatable ProcessSkills
Skills:
Empathetic – deeply understanding the goals, drivers, and needs of others.
Service-oriented – ready to go the extra mile for their clients.
Strategic – doesn't get trapped in the weeds, understand the bigger picture.
Proactive – doesn't wait to take action, is in charge.
